Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Brake system pressure decay. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 05/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
